summary: This document is a Capital One auto finance application and approval for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler, submitted by Sergio Amestegui through dealer Major World Chevrolet. It includes the credit application, approval details, and a NADA vehicle valuation report. The document appears to be part of financial records related to vehicle purchases. This document is a New York State vehicle registration/title application and associated insurance certificate for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler, registered to an individual at a Brooklyn address. It includes insurance documentation from Allstate Fire and Casualty Insurance Company and a dealer certification from Major World Chevrolet/Chrysler Jeep Dodge Ram.

persons.name: Sergio Amestegui
persons.context: Individual applying for and approved for auto financing to purchase a 2015 Jeep Wrangler from Major World Chevrolet.

persons.name: Alphonso Clark

persons.name: Borislay Tabak

persons.context: Capital One analyst listed as the Funding Manager for the auto finance application.

connections.description: Amestegui is the customer purchasing a vehicle from dealer Major World Chevrolet, where Clark is a representative.
Tabak is the Capital One Relationship Manager who processed Amestegui's auto loan application.
Paella is the Capital One Funding Manager involved in the approval and funding of Amestegui's auto loan.

events.title: Auto Loan Application Approved
events.description: Capital One Auto Finance approves Sergio Amestegui's application for financing a 2015 Jeep Wrangler.

events.title: Vehicle Insurance Policy Effective
events.description: An insurance policy for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler, registered to an individual in Brooklyn, becomes effective.

events.title: Insurance Certificate Issued
events.description: Allstate Fire and Casualty Insurance Company issues a certificate of insurance for the vehicle.

locations: Major World Chevrolet, L.L.C., 43-40 Northern Blvd., Long Island City, NY 11101
keyFacts: Sergio Amestegui was approved for a Capital One auto loan on December 12, 2016, to finance a used 2015 Jeep Wrangler.
The application lists Amestegui's employer as the NY STATE ASSEMBLY with an annual salary of $79,500.00 and an occupation listed as 'ASSEMBLER'.
The vehicle purchase was processed through dealer Major World Chevrolet, with dealer representative Alphonso Clark listed on the bill of sale.
The loan was approved for $21,392.00 at an APR of 8.64% for a 72-month term, with a $6,000 down payment.
The document includes a NADA vehicle valuation report dated December 12, 2016, assessing the Jeep's value.
The document is a vehicle registration application for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler, with a Brooklyn, NY 11234 address listed for the primary registrant.
Insurance is provided by Allstate Fire and Casualty Insurance Company, with broker Jared Shulman listed.
The lienholder/finance company is listed as CAPITAL ONE, with an address in Sacramento, CA.
The associated dealership is Major World Chevrolet/Chrysler Jeep Dodge Ram.
The primary registrant's name is redacted in the provided text, appearing as blank fields or placeholders.
